data.title: Famous People from North Carolina
data.meta_description: President and duelist? His airness? Name these famous people from the state of North Carolina.
data.text:
Clue

Hometown

Answer

President and duelist

-

Andrew Jackson

The first President to be impeached

Raleigh

Wife of the 1996 Republican nominee who ran for President herself

New Garden

Tenor saxophone player who recorded "A Love Supreme"

Raleigh
